introduction: Mariana van Zeller investigates the dark corners of black market plastic surgery, where sex, greed and social media drive patients toward deadly motel-room operations. In Miami's discount surgery centers, she uncovers a bombshell connection between felons, greedy doctors and patient deaths.S2 E1 Black Market SurgeryS2 E2 Romance ScamsS2 E3 Black Market MarijuanaS2 E4 Outlaw Motorcycle GangsS2 E5 MethS2 E6 White SupremacyS2 E7 Stolen CarsS2 E8 Cocaine QueensS2 E9 Amazon MafiaS2 E10 Fish Pirates
